1.「ご利用ありがとうございました。| 登録内容の変更は いつでも できますからね。: Thank you for your interest... You can make|changes to your registration at any time...|Please feel free to...<end>

5.「それらのアイテムを持ち込むには| 素材が足りないようです。| セット内容の 見: We don't have enough materials to bring those|items in... I'm going to need you to review|the set.<bw_break>

6.「どのアイテムを 持ち込み物資として| 登録しますか？|<break>: Which items would you like to register as|carry-on supplies?<break>

7.「無職の私ですが あなたが | 戦場に おもむく際に 持っていく| 回復用のどう:
I'm an unemployed man, but I was wondering if|you could help me with some of the gear I|need to bring with me when I go into battle.|

|battlefield. However, when you return from|the battlefield, we will collect your gear...|We won't be returning any of the materials,|
|so please be patient!
